title: Trundle's pillar still doesn't debuff scuttle crab. I've seen dozens of threads on this.
body: Is this ever going to be fixed or is Riot just going to ignore it? Just google Trundle Scuttle crab. There are tons of other posts about this bug dating more than a year ago.

replies.body:
Trundle pillar does not apply any hard crowdcontrol, it only pushes without stunning or silencing the target in the area, it is NOT a knockback. If done against enemy champions, they can still cast abilities, or attack as they please. This implies that scuttle crab will not be debuffed.

so, this is not a bug.

It cancels channels

Channels cancels on a different rule set than just 'hard cc' , but for the reported issue, it's working as intended. 

Trundle pillar can also stop ally recalls. :\
How is displacement not considered hard crowd control? It can stop channels, teleports, recalling, everything.
So can anivia wall, no scuttles debuff there :P
Trundle's displacement does not actually disable, however.

I guess it's more a question for Balance Team, but if it's technically not a bug, can some special-casing be considered so that Trundle can kill the Scuttle efficiently? Can you forward this question to the relevant people?
